data.quote: A person destiny is what he thinks of himself.
data.author: Govind Dixit

data.quote: Cooperation must be earned not demanded
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
data.author: Heraclitus

data.quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
data.author: Indira Gandhi

data.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.
data.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

data.quote: Do not mind anything that anyone tells you about anyone else. Judge everyone and everything for yourself.
data.author: Henry James

data.quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
data.author: Jane Austen

data.quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
data.author: Edgar Allan Poe

data.quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.
data.author: Francis of Assisi

data.quote: The only journey is the one within.
data.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

data.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
data.author: William Blake

data.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
data.author: Khalil Gibran

data.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
data.author: Aesop

data.quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
data.author: George Washington

data.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
data.author: Thomas Carlyle

data.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
data.author: Amelia Earhart

data.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
data.author: Aristotle Onassis

data.quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
